page.title: 20The Church-North Door
page.content: {St. Nicholas' Church}in Boarhunt is made of flint and stone with a tiled roof. The North Door known as the {Devil's Door}was never used by common people, only witches and evil spirits used it. It was said that if a possesed child was christened the exorised spirit fled through the North Door. After the civil war between the Royalists and the Roundheads,many doors were bricked up to stamp out superstition about witches. An ordinary person could walk through that door and istantly gain the repute of being a witch or worlock. These people were either mobbed or if a minister was near,put to the test either way they died. Then again it could be the door was blocked up for some completely mundane reason!!!!!!
